item.title: About Me
item.author: wangxuke.china@gmail.com (luminecs)
item.description:
Hi, I’m luminecs, a programmer.

I really like writing code, and I have been writing Java code for six years. I have also written some other languages, such as JavaScript, Dart, etc.

This website was established to record my thoughts, because I find that in-depth study is very necessary. Unfortunately, the past few years of my coding career have not been carefully documented, so much knowledge and thinking has been lost.

Thanks for reading.
